DOC.brief_summary: Double-blind , randomize , two period crossover comparison cognitive behavioral effect Eslicarbazepine acetate Carbamazepine healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Cognitive Behavioral Effects Eslicarbazepine Acetate Carbamazepine Healthy Adults
DOC.detailed_description: This study double-blind , randomize , two period crossover design . The study consist 6 visit 21 week period . Forty six ( 46 ) normal healthy subject treat Eslicarbazepine acetate ( ESL , 800 mg/day ) Carbamazepine ( CBZ , 800mg/day ) 6 week 3 day ( maintenance 4 week taper 3 day ) . Each antiepileptic drug ( AED ) treatment period follow four day taper washout period AED remainder month . Cognitive behavioral test along safety test conduct pretreatment baseline , end randomization AED maintenance period , final washout period .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy adult age 18 55 year old . 2 . Male female 1 . Presence clinically significant cardiovascular , endocrine , hematopoietic , hepatic , neurologic , psychiatric , renal disease pregnancy . 2 . Presence history drug alcohol abuse . 3 . The use concomitant medication , know affect ESL Carbamazepine use concomitant medication may alter cognitive function ( see Section VII.E partial list ) . 4 . Use oral contraceptive hormone medication could affect ESL Carbamazepine . 5 . Prior adverse reaction prior hypersensitivity either study medication relate compound . 6 . Prior participation study involve anticonvulsant medication . 7 . Subjects receive investigational drug within previous thirty day . 8 . Subjects IQ < 70 determine Peabody Picture Vocabulary Test . 9 . Presence HLA B*1502 subject Asian descent ; obtain screen subject Asian descent .
